metadata.name: Ray
metadata.description: For a young man his teenage years are a journey of discovery and wonder. However, for Noah Whitman his journey just hit a dead end. Mom has moved them to Dellwood, Wisconsin. And nothing happens in Dellwood. Right? The authorities would be inclined to agree, if it wasn't for the recent spate of mysterious occurrences that seem to lead back to that sleepy town. Now, as Noah eases into school life, he meets the feisty Zoe, and Hawk, a teenage boy on his own journey of discovery: one that could benefit mankind... or destroy it.
